attributes.action: Make it law for manufacturers to CLEARLY label recycling info on packaging
attributes.additional_details:
Recycling info on packaging should NOT be:
- Absent, regardless of whether it was included on the box that carried the individual products
- Hidden on a discreet location on the packaging. It should NOT be on the underside of packaging, only visible when you open the lid/film.
- Vague. Some products have the recycling logo, but with no recycling codes (1/PET, 2/HDPE, 3/PVC, 4/LDPE, 5/PP, 6/PS, 7/other). Some don't specify the recycling info of each material used.

*www.recycle-more.co.uk
attributes.background:
Only 37%* of plastic packaging is recycled in the UK. Making the process of finding the recycling info harder does NOT help.

Clearer recycling info on packaging is needed.
